import sys


def main():
    n = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    vs = [int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().split()]
    cs = [int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().split()]
    diffs = [v - c for v, c in zip(vs, cs)]
    print(max(diffs))


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

n = int(input())
v = list(map(int, input().split()))
c = list(map(int, input().split()))

print(sum(v) - sum(c))

import heapq

n = int(input())
v = list(map(int, input().split()))
c = list(map(int, input().split()))

h = []
for i in range(n):
    heapq.heappush(h, (v[i]-c[i], v[i], c[i]))

ans = 0
while h:
    x = heapq.heappop(h)
    if x[0] > 0:
        ans += x[1]
    else:
        ans -= x[2]

print(ans)

# Get input
n = int(input())
V = list(map(int,input().split()))
C = list(map(int,input().split()))

# Calculate the maximum possible value of X-Y
max_X_minus_Y = 0
for i in range(n):
    if V[i] - C[i] > 0:
        max_X_minus_Y += V[i] - C[i]

print(max_X_minus_Y)

#=== Initialize input ===
N = int(input())
V = list(map(int, input().split()))
C = list(map(int, input().split()))

#=== Solve the problem ===
# Calculate the difference and sort the list in ascending order
diff = [v-c for v,c in zip(V,C)]
diff.sort()

# Sum up the list until the sum becomes negative
ans = 0
for d in diff:
    ans += d
    if ans < 0:
        ans = 0
        break

#=== Print the answer ===
print(ans)
